Data: {"recipient_id": "761843b2-374b-4dbb-b420-80947c159e0f", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
My profile was rejected. What info is needed to verify? I have all of it ready

To proceed with the verification process and have your account approved, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
- Business URL

Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
Great! Once you've sent the information, our team will review it and get back to you with an update on your account status. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask!

The review process can vary, but typically it takes a few business days for our team to verify the information and update your account status. If you haven't heard back within a week, feel free to reach out again for an update.
Awesome! Our team will review your submission and get back to you as soon as possible. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, just let me know!
Do i need a DUNS number or is there another way to verify?

If you don't have a DUNS number, you can provide an EHID or other relevant business identification number for verification. If you're unsure about what to provide, feel free to email adsupport@newsbreak.com for further guidance.
I provided my EIN & Articles of Orginication documents

That sounds good! Providing your EIN and Articles of Organization should help in the verification process. Our team will review these documents and get back to you with an update. If there's anything else you need, feel free to ask!
